title: Profit of leading mutual property/casualty insurance companies 2018
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Insurance Companies, and Profit in million U.S. dollars in each Insurance Companies on the y axis.
The Profit in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and lowest at Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange.
The difference of Profit in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Insurance Companies is 8717.9.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Insurance Companies in the x axis and Profit in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Profit in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Insurance Companiess.
Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. has the highest Profit in million U.S. dollars and Farmers Insurance Exchange has the lowest Profit in million U.S. dollars.
The second highest Profit in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Insurance Companies Auto-Owners Insurance.
The difference of Profit in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Insurance Companies is 8717.9.
Profit in million U.S. dollars at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. is 8788.4 , second place is Auto-Owners Insurance at 754.5, and thirdly is Erie Insurance Group at 686.3.
The lowest value 70.5 at Farmers Insurance Exchange is almost 6.15 times smaller than the average value 1428.15.
